snippet: South Korea plans to resume hunting whales for research purposes, officials said Thursday, drawing immediate protests from nonwhaling nations and environmental groups.
abstract: South Korea plans to resume hunting whales for research purposes, drawing immediate protests from nonwhaling nations and environmental groups that suspect the plan may be a cover for commercial whaling; fishermen complain that an increasing number of whales are consuming large amounts of fish, threatening their livelihood,
lead_paragraph: South Korea plans to resume hunting whales for research purposes, officials said Thursday, drawing immediate protests from nonwhaling nations and environmental groups.
